sage.scripting

Class BehaviorScript

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.File
      • sage.scripting.DataScript
        • sage.scripting.BehaviorScript
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<java.io.File>, IScript

    public abstract class BehaviorScript
extends DataScript
    This class acts as the abstract base class from which all concrete behavior scripts are derived. Derived behavior scripts are required to have the functions init() and update() which call the corresponding functions in the actual script file.
    Author:
    Kenneth Barnett
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
